message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to offer it to you for $250. Is this something you'd be interested in?
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your effort. I would like to make a counteroffer of $150 for the product.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob, but I'm afraid I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $200. Is this something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand your position, Alice. Let me make a counteroffer of $175 for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $225. Is this something you'd be willing to consider?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to make a counteroffer of $200 for the product.

I'm not willing to go any lower than $225, Bob. I'm starting to feel like we're getting close to a deal, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $212.50. Is this something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to make a counteroffer of $205 for the product.

I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one last concession, so I'm counteroffering at $215. If we can't agree on a price by the next round, I'll have to consider other options. Is this something you'd be willing to consider?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to make a final counteroffer of $210 for the product.
